SmartFieldSpec.Name: RGL First Appeal Source for Constituent Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Get the first appeal source for the constituent within the RGL subset of sponsorships
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Jeff Mawhirter
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_RGLFIRSTAPPEALSOURCE ( @ASOF datetime ) as SELECT origin.sponsorid, origin.source -- subselect to get the appeal info from the first RGL row per constituent from (select distinct COALESCE(rgl1.financialsponsorid, sponsorid) as sponsorid, rgl1.startdate, rgl1.sourcecategory as appeal_cat, rgl1.package as appeal_name, rgl1.source from USR_COMMITMENTLINE_RECURRINGGIFT rgl1 join smartfieldBB91D38CB66F44A3A65E37E7F4D99941 ed on coalesce(rgl1.financialsponsorid, rgl1.sponsorid) = ed.id join RevenueSplit rs on rgl1.RecurringGiftID = rs.RevenueID join Sponsorship s on rs.id = s.RevenueSplitId join usr_sponsorshipextension se on s.id = se.id where rgl1.startdate <= ed.value and rgl1.startdate = (select min(startdate) from USR_COMMITMENTLINE_RECURRINGGIFT rgl2 where coalesce(rgl2.financialsponsorid, rgl2.sponsorid) = coalesce(rgl1.financialsponsorid, rgl1.sponsorid)) and sequenceid = (select min(sequenceid) from USR_COMMITMENTLINE_RECURRINGGIFT rgl3 where rgl3.startdate = rgl1.startdate and coalesce(rgl3.financialsponsorid, rgl3.sponsorid) = coalesce(rgl1.financialsponsorid, rgl1.sponsorid)) and rgl1.type in('Direct', 'Prospect', 'Conversion') and se.isaccountcorrection = 0 ) origin
